intro_section.title: Idea of this website
intro_section.p1: This website was created from a desire to share timeless wisdom — words that inspire, encourage reflection, and offer new perspectives.
intro_section.p2: At the heart of this journey is Socrates, one of history’s greatest philosophers, whose famous quote, “I know that I know nothing,” captures the essence of humility and lifelong learning.
intro_section.p3: This platform brings together the voices of influential thinkers, past and present, offering a space where their insights can spark inspiration and guide us forward.

about_page.title: My Portfolio Website
about_page.p1: A while ago, an idea sparked in my mind – to create a personal portfolio website. The beginning was humble and simple, but gradually, this vision grew into a much more substantial project. I'm delighted to present a website built using the latest technologies, where I hope you'll find a lot of useful information.
about_page.p2: Here, you'll discover a wealth of inspiring quotes and biographies of famous personalities. I believe visitors will find insights into how philosophy and the thoughts of great thinkers influence our lives. After all, we grew up surrounded by countless quotes, and now the ideas of many authors have become an integral part of our thinking.
about_page.p3: This project was born unexpectedly – during rehabilitation at a sanatorium. I decided to use the free moments, which would normally be for rest, meaningfully and realize an old dream.
about_page.p4: I sincerely want to thank the dear people without whom this project would not have seen the light of day. First and foremost, a big THANK YOU to my significant other for their invaluable support, strength, wisdom, and creativity. Thank you to my son for daily inspiration. And, of course, thank you to my mother and grandmother for their endless care and nurture.
about_page.p5: If you believe my work is worthy of appreciation and would like to contribute to the realization of future projects, I would be sincerely grateful for your support. I still have many ideas and plans that I can't wait to turn into reality!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal data is collected, used, and shared when you visit or use this website.

data_collection.title: Information We Collect
data_collection.p1: We do not directly collect any personally identifiable information from our visitors. This website is designed to be purely informative and does not have features that require personal data input (e.g., user accounts, contact forms, comment sections).
data_collection.list1: We do not use analytics tools (like Google Analytics) that track your behavior.
data_collection.list2: We do not collect your IP address or any other identifying network information.
data_collection.list3: We do not collect information about your browser, device, or operating system.
data_collection.p2: Any data processed by third-party services (if any are implicitly used, such as hosting provider logs) is outside our direct control and is not actively collected or managed by us for analytical or marketing purposes.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.p1: This website uses only essential cookies for its basic functionality, specifically for managing your dark mode preference and your cookie consent choice.
cookies.p2: These cookies do not collect any personal data and are necessary for the website to function as expected. We do not use third-party advertising or tracking cookies.
cookies.p3: By continuing to use this website, you consent to the use of these essential cookies. Your dark mode preference is stored locally on your device for your convenience.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.p1: Given that we do not collect personal data, the risk of data breaches is minimized. We strive to maintain the security of our website and protect it from unauthorized access.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.p1: Under the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), you have certain rights regarding your personal data. Since we do not collect personal data, most of these rights are not applicable. However, we ensure transparency regarding data processing:
your_rights.list1: Right to information: You have the right to know what data we collect (which, in our case, is none).
your_rights.list2: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'): Since we do not store your personal data, there is no data to erase.
your_rights.list3: Right to object: You can object to the use of cookies through your browser settings or by declining our cookie consent.
your_rights.list4: Right to access: You can review our open-source code to verify our data practices.
your_rights.p2: For any concerns related to privacy, you can adjust your browser settings or simply stop using the website.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us via email.
